solution_line_template: Kendra has {kendra_packs} packs x {pens_per_pack} pens/pack =<<{kendra_packs}*{pens_per_pack}={kendra_pens}>>{kendra_pens} pens
Tony has {tony_packs} packs x {pens_per_pack} pens/pack = <<{tony_packs}*{pens_per_pack}={tony_pens}>>{tony_pens} pens
In total Kendra and Tony have {kendra_pens} pens + {tony_pens} pens = <<{kendra_pens}+{tony_pens}={total_pens}>>{total_pens} pens
If they each keep {pens_to_keep_each} pens, they keep {num_people} x {pens_to_keep_each} = <<{num_people}*{pens_to_keep_each}={total_pens_kept}>>{total_pens_kept} pens
They will be able to give a pen to {total_pens} pens - {total_pens_kept} pens = <<{total_pens}-{total_pens_kept}={friends_to_give_pens}>>{friends_to_give_pens} of their friends
